title: Demon Investigation Corporation: A D.I.C paranormal story - Round one
description: Jorge Sanderson works hard for D.I.C. No wait, it's not what you think! The Demon Investigation Corporation are the team you send in when the fairy tale creatures stop playing by the rules. Trolls, harpies and other paranormal freaks? They're all real, and they're all a pain in the ass. Jorge may be a genetic hot mess and a sarcastic bitch, but she's the first line of defence against the things that go bump in the night...and day. the only problem is, someone definitely wants her dead... With each mission threatening to be her last, just how far will Jorge go for D.I.C? No, not like that!!
author: Lorraine Agent
